resources.string: No app for opening this type of file is available
You can add frequently used folders to favorites for easy access from anywhere.
A simple file manager for browsing and editing files and directories.

Can also be used for browsing root files and SDcard content. You can easily rename, copy, move, delete and share anything you wish.
Contains no ads or unnecessary permissions. It is fully opensource, provides a Dark theme too.
This app is just one piece of a bigger series of apps. You can find the rest of them at http://www.simplemobiletools.com
